channel.title: vim on vim, git, aws and other three-letter words
channel.description: Recent content in vim on vim, git, aws and other three-letter words

item.title: git - use vim with fugitive to resolve merge conflicts
item.description: To use fugitive as you mergetool you can use the following. git config --global mergetool.fugitive.cmd 'vim -f -c "Gdiff" "$MERGED"' git config --global merge.tool fugitive Links stackoverflow fugitive screencast
